name: Rankai
title: rankai.ai
shortDescription: Rankai leverages AI to offer fully managed SEO services at a lower cost than traditional agencies. It is designed for startups and SMBs looking to improve their online visibility without extensive in-house SEO expertise. Users can benefit from automated technical SEO fixes, content generation, and continuous updates powered by the latest AI models.
pros: Continuous updates with latest AI models

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Moz Pro
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Comprehensive SEO toolset with manual controls

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: SEMrush
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Broad digital marketing tools with SEO focus

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Ahrefs
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Strong backlink analysis and SEO audit features
